Rabigh 2 IPP (R2IPP) bụ ọrụ Combined Cycle Power Station nke ka na-aga n'ihu n'ụsọ ikpere osimiri ọdịda anyanwụ nke Saudi Arabia, kilomita 150 n'ebe mgbago ugwu Jeddah
R2IPP ga-enwe ikike mmepụta eletrik nke megawatts 2,060 iji nye mpaghara Makkah ike eletrik
Ọrụ ahụ ga-enye Saudi Electricity Company n'okpuru Power Purchase Agreement ọkụ eletrik nke nwere oge afọ 20 site na ụbọchị ọrụ azụmahịa a haziri na June 2020.

Ọrụ ahụ ga-eji Natural Gas dị ka isi mmanụ ya na Arabian Super Light (ASL) dị ka mmanụ ndabere yana itinye n'ọrụ Combined Cycle Power Station na nhazi nke blọk atọ, nke ọ bụla nwere Gas Turbines abụọ nke arụmọrụ dị elu, Heat Recovery Steam Generators abụọ na otu Steam Turbine nwere nrụgide ụzọ atọ nke ga-ebelata oriri mmanụ, mmetụta na okpomọkụ mmiri dị n'osimiri na mgbasa ikuku carbon na gburugburu ebe obibi

R2IPP nwere blọk ike 4 yiri onwe ha, nke ọ bụla na-emepụta ike mgbakọta dị 686.5 MW. Maka nke ọ bụla n'ime nkeji ndị a, Siemens na-enye SGT6-5000F gas turbines ụdị abụọ, otu ụdị SST6-5000 HI-L steam turbine, na igwe ọkụ eletrik SGen6-1000A-series
Ọ ga-abụ IPP nke izizi nwere nnukwu arụmọrụ okpomọkụ nke 58.8% na ọnọdụ ebe ntụaka.
Ọdịdị ndị nwere òkè nke Al Mourjan For Electricity Production Company gunyere ndị a:
A họpụtala ụlọ ọrụ Samsung C&T dị ka onye ọrụ EPC.
Ntinye aka na nkwekọrịta: December 25, 2013 Njedebe: June 25, 2020
